sentence.text: To understand the mechanism of TAM-resistance in GPER activated ER+ breast cancer, the function of regulation of neuron apoptotic process and Bim inducing cell apoptosis was studied.
By using immunohistochemical and western blot analysis, there is an adverse correlation between regulation of neuron apoptotic process and Bim in TAM-resistant breast tumor tissues and MCF-7R cells.

Activation of GPER and its downstream signaling MAPK/angiogenesis, not phosphorylation/positive regulation of protein phosphorylation, led to enhanced regulation of neuron apoptotic process protein levels and affected the binding between TRIM2 and Bim which resulted in a reduced Bim in TAM-resistant breast cancer cells.
